tool.name: Calculate Centroid [SPAC] [DMAP]
tool.description: Calculate the centroid of bonding box of the cell. \ Please refer to DUET Documentation, GitHub Documentation for further information.
tool.command: echo '{"dataframe": {"type": "file", "name": "dataframe.csv"}}' > outputs_config.json && python '$__tool_directory__/format_values.py' 'galaxy_params.json' 'cleaned_params.json' --inject-outputs --outputs-config outputs_config.json && python -c "from spac.templates.calculate_centroid_template import run_from_json; run_from_json('cleaned_params.json')"

param.name: Upstream_Dataset
param.label: Upstream Dataset
param.help: Link to prior processed dataset in the analysis.

param.name: Min_X_Coordinate_Column_Name
param.label: Min X Coordinate Column Name
param.help: Name of column containing minimum X coordinate.

param.name: Max_X_Coordinate_Column_Name
param.label: Max X Coordinate Column Name
param.help: Name of column containing maximum X coordinate.

param.name: Min_Y_Coordinate_Column_Name
param.label: Min Y Coordinate Column Name
param.help: Name of column containing minimum Y coordinate.

param.name: Max_Y_Coordinate_Column_Name
param.label: Max Y Coordinate Column Name
param.help: Name of column containing maximum Y coordinate.

param.name: X_Centroid_Name
param.label: X Centroid Name
param.help: Name of column containing X centroid, default XCentroid.

param.name: Y_Centroid_Name
param.label: Y Centroid Name
param.help: Name of column containing Y centroid, default YCentroid.

tool.help: **Calculate Centroid [SPAC] [DMAP]** Calculate the centroid of bonding box of the cell. \ Please refer to DUET Documentation, GitHub Documentation for further information. **Outputs:** - dataframe: file (dataframe.csv)
